Comments_List: I developed my skills in reading, writing, speaking, and listening in Czech. I came in with no knowledge of the language and left with a solid understanding of the grammar.
I learned to decode Czech sentences from a variety of sources.

The class was very laid back which, in my opinion, helps facilitate language learning. This allowed us all to speak freely in Czech without the fear of messing up. When we did mess up, we were corrected in a very helpful manner. The one weakness of this course would be that it was sometimes disorganized. It was hard to keep track of the order in which we were learning things.
The professor is the best. She makes studying the language very entertaining.
I would recommend this course. It was a fun way to begin learning a new language.
Yes! Czech with professor kvk is a lot of fun and you will learn a lot.
